backend/main.mo: Defines actor state, authorization mixin, and all shared types for users, roles, servers, channels, messages, audit logs, and comparisons.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a noâ€‘op migration function returning the input state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining light/dark variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing auth, profile setup, theme, providers, and rendering the main shell.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: UI component rendering a collapsible channel category with text/voice channels and a dialog to create new channels.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Modal form to create a new category in a server, handling backend guard and mutation state.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, with type selection and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Input composer for sending text messages with backend guard and keyboard shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected channel, auto-scrolls, and includes the message composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, timestamp, and role-colored username.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Server discovery page with search filtering and join actions for community servers.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Card showing a server preview with name, description, member count, and join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Direct messages home view showing either friends or an empty DM state.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Row component displaying a friend's profile, status, and quick action buttons.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Renders the friends page with tabs for online, all, pending, blocked, and add friend, including friend request actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Desktop layout wrapper that arranges server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list panel.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to display based on navigation state, including DMs, servers, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout with slide-out sheets for servers, channels, members, and access to user settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shells based on window width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays a scrollable list of server members with avatars, usernames, and role-colored names.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Shows the home or server channel sidebar, listing categories, channels, and settings options.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Mobile top bar providing navigation buttons, server or view title, and quick access to settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Vertical server list with home button, ordered servers, and a button to create new servers.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog that collects a display name and saves a new user profile before continuing.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: UI for assigning or removing server roles from a user with pending-change tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Profile overlay showing user info, roles, and administrative actions like role management.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Form dialog to create a new server with name and optional description, respecting backend restrictions.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server's icon or a fallback initial if none exists.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog to create a text or voice channel within a specified server category.
Dialog for selecting a new category and moving a text or voice channel to it.
Displays a sortable audit log of server events with formatted timestamps and principals.
Manages categories and channels, including creation, ordering, and moving channels between categories.
Server settings page allowing updates to description, media URLs, and community mode.
Lists roles and provides a dialog to create new roles with configurable permissions and color.
Container for server settings pages, providing navigation and section rendering.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Allows users to change theme and adjust text scaling.
Form page allowing users to view and update their profile fields and username via backend mutation hooks.
Shell UI for user settings with navigation between profile, appearance, and logout.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Empty placeholder component; contains no implementation.
Displays speakers and audience for a stage channel with basic UI and a raise-hand button.
Voice channel interface showing participants, connection state, join/leave actions, and mute/deafen controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple disabled/reason guard based on backend connection state.
Establishes and monitors backend actor health, exposing connection state, errors, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears the user's identity and resets all cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, username, and profile data with backend connection and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance with authentication, retries, and non-fatal access control initialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, base styles, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, query client provider, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login UI allowing users to authenticate with Internet Identity and displaying errors or loading states.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides navigation context for tracking current view, server, channel, and UI panels with update helpers.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages notification overrides in localStorage and checks whether servers or channels are muted.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Settings context storing theme, accent colors, text scale, notification prefs, and keybinds with persistence.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Utility functions to sanitize role colors and compute contrast and lightness for styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing) and store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, existing features, and pending requests related to server roles, role display, assignment, and username color behavior.
